hop.to: Get Field Format (by Field Data Type)

hop.from: Get Field Format (by Field Data Type)

step.name: Get Field Format (by Field Data Type)

parameter.name: EXCEL_DIR
parameter.description: Directory where the MS Excel output should be stored

parameter.name: EXCEL_FILE
parameter.description: Filename of the MS Excel output file

parameter.name: JDBC_DRIVER
parameter.description: Java fully qualified classname of the JDBC driver

parameter.name: SQL
parameter.description: SQL statement for which the result should be dumped to MS Excel

notepad.note:
A generic job to dump a resultset retrieved from a database with a SQL statement to a MS Excel file. Works with kettle 3.2.0 and up
Use the Job parameters to control the job behaviour:
EXCEL_DIR: Directory where the MS Excel output should be stored EXCEL_FILE : Filename of the MS Excel output file JDBC_DRIVER: Java fully qualified classname of the JDBC driver JDBC_PASSWORD: Password for the JDBC connection JDBC_URL: URL for the JDBC connection JDBC_USER: Username for the JDBC connection SQL: SQL statement for which the result should be dumped to MS Excel
